content.text: Match ends, Watford 4, Chelsea 1.
Second Half ends, Watford 4, Chelsea 1.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Orestis Karnezis.
Attempt saved. Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Eden Hazard with a headed pass.
Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Abdoulaye Doucouré (Watford).
Offside, Chelsea. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Eden Hazard is caught offside.
Substitution, Watford. Andre Gray replaces Troy Deeney.
Goal!  Watford 4, Chelsea 1. Roberto Pereyra (Watford) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Abdoulaye Doucouré.
Substitution, Watford. André Carrillo replaces Gerard Deulofeu.
Goal!  Watford 3, Chelsea 1. Gerard Deulofeu (Watford) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Abdoulaye Doucouré following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Olivier Giroud.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Gerard Deulofeu (Watford).
Goal!  Watford 2, Chelsea 1. Daryl Janmaat (Watford) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Roberto Pereyra.
Attempt missed. Gerard Deulofeu (Watford) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Etienne Capoue with a through ball following a fast break.
Goal!  Watford 1, Chelsea 1. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
